hero.title: Earn Rewards on Every Purchase
hero.subtitle: Join thousands of shoppers earning points at local stores. Redeem for gifts, discounts, and more.

steps.title: Sign Up
steps.desc: Create your free account in under 60 seconds.

steps.title: Shop & Earn
steps.desc: Scan your QR code at any partner store to earn points.

steps.title: Redeem Rewards
steps.desc: Turn points into vouchers, gifts, or cashback instantly.

categories.title: Shop at Your Favorite Places
categories.subtitle: Earn points at thousands of partner stores across multiple categories

mobile.title: Mobile App Features
mobile.subtitle: Take your rewards with you everywhere. Our mobile app makes earning and redeeming points easier than ever.

features.title: Digital QR Code
features.desc: Never forget your card again with built-in QR scanning

features.title: Smart Notifications
features.desc: Get alerts for nearby deals and bonus point opportunities

features.title: Store Locator
features.desc: Find partner stores near you with GPS integration

features.title: Progress Tracking
features.desc: Monitor your points, tier progress, and spending history

promotions.title: Limited Time Offers
promotions.moreComing: More offers coming soon — stay loyal!

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.review: I've earned over $200 in rewards just from my regular shopping. The app is so easy to use!

items.name: Mike Chen
items.review: Love discovering new local businesses through the app. The rewards are just a bonus!

items.name: Emily Davis
items.review: The referral program is amazing! I've invited 10 friends and we all benefit.

items.a: Shop at any partner store and scan your QR code at checkout. Points are added instantly.
Redeem in your dashboard, at checkout in stores, or via the mobile app.
Yes! 100% free for all users – no membership fees or hidden charges.
Points remain active as long as you make at least one purchase every 12 months.

items.q: How do I check my points balance?
items.a: Log in to your dashboard or open the mobile app – your balance is shown on the home screen.

items.q: What if I lose my QR code?
items.a: No problem! Regenerate your QR code anytime from your profile settings.

items.q: Can I use points at any store?
items.a: Points work at all participating partner stores. Look for the Loyalty Rewards sign!

items.q: How does the referral program work?
items.a: Share your unique referral code with friends. They get 500 points when they join and make their first purchase, and you get 1000 points!

finalCTA.title: Start Earning Rewards Today
finalCTA.subtitle: Join 10,000+ members already saving with every purchase.

features.title: Powerful Features That Drive Loyalty
features.subtitle: Everything you need to build stronger customer relationships and grow your business.

targetedRewards.title: Targeted Rewards
targetedRewards.desc: Reward customers based on their purchase behavior to increase loyalty and repeat visits.
targetedRewards.details: Our AI‑driven engine analyses every transaction and automatically suggests the best reward for each shopper. You can set rules like “spend $50 → 10 pts” or “buy 3 coffees → free drink”.

mobileFirst.title: Mobile‑First Experience
mobileFirst.desc: Seamless access on any device for users and shopkeepers to track points and redeem rewards.
mobileFirst.details: Both the customer app and the shopkeeper dashboard are PWA‑ready. Customers scan a QR code to instantly see their points, redeem offers, and receive push notifications.

referralBoost.title: Referral Boost
referralBoost.desc: Grow your customer base with rewards for referrals. Top referrers shine on the leaderboard!
referralBoost.details: Every successful referral earns the referrer 50 pts + a bonus for the new user. The live leaderboard updates in real‑time, motivating friendly competition.

smartAnalytics.title: Smart Analytics
smartAnalytics.desc: Real‑time insights into sales, engagement, and loyalty performance to drive growth.
smartAnalytics.details: Interactive charts show redemption rates, average basket size per tier, and ROI of each campaign. Export CSV with one click.

tieredRewards.title: Tiered Rewards
tieredRewards.desc: Create VIP milestones and exclusive bonuses for your most loyal customers.
tieredRewards.details: Define Bronze → Silver → Gold tiers. Unlock exclusive coupons, early‑access sales, and birthday gifts automatically when a user hits the threshold.

smartAlerts.title: Smart Alerts
smartAlerts.desc: Keep users engaged with instant updates on points, rewards, and promotions.
smartAlerts.details: Push, SMS, or in‑app notifications are triggered by events: “You earned 20 pts!”, “Your free coffee is ready”, “Flash sale – 2× points today”.

resources.title: Loyalty Program Resources
resources.subtitle: Everything you need to understand, manage, and maximize your loyalty experience.

howPointsWork.title: How Loyalty Points Work
howPointsWork.desc: Learn how you earn, track, and redeem points in our system.
steps: Points appear instantly in your dashboard.
howPointsWork.tip: Points never expire if you shop every 12 months.

businessBenefits.title: Benefits for Businesses
businessBenefits.desc: Discover how loyalty programs boost customer retention and revenue.
tips: Use analytics to run targeted campaigns
Reward top spenders with VIP tiers

referralGuide.title: Referral Program Guide
referralGuide.desc: Maximize your earnings by referring others and topping the leaderboard.
referralGuide.tip: Top 10 referrers win exclusive rewards monthly

redemptionRules.title: Reward Redemption Rules
redemptionRules.desc: Understand the terms and conditions for redeeming your earned rewards.

dashboardFeatures.title: Loyalty Dashboard Features
dashboardFeatures.desc: Track your purchase history, referral stats, and bonus rewards all in one place.
dashboardFeatures.tip: Export reports as PDF or CSV

promotions.title: Promotions & Bonuses
promotions.desc: Stay updated on seasonal offers and limited-time bonus point opportunities.
promos: Flash sales: 3× points on select items
promotions.tip: Enable notifications to never miss a deal

hero.title: Shop Registration Process
hero.subtitle: Follow the road from subscription to success

1.title: Subscribe to a Plan
1.desc: Choose your plan to unlock shopkeeper access. Required first.

2.title: Create Your Account
2.desc: Enter shop name, email, phone, city & country.

3.title: Verify Company Email & Enter Company Details
3.desc: Use your subscribed email. Instant verification.

4.title: Create Password & Verify CAPTCHA
4.desc: Secure your account by setting a strong password and proving you're human.
details: Include a number and special symbol

5.title: Sign In with Email, Password & CAPTCHA
5.desc: Log in securely using your new credentials.

6.title: Access Dashboard
6.desc: You’re in! Start managing customers, rewards & analytics.

finalCTA.text: Ready to launch your loyalty program?

faqs.q: Which email should I use to log in?
faqs.a: Use the personal email you signed up with (e.g., john.doe@gmail.com). This is the email you entered during registration – not your company email.

faqs.q: How do I log in to the shopkeeper dashboard?
faqs.a: 1. Go to the login page → 2. Enter your personal email → 3. Enter your password → 4. Solve the CAPTCHA (first login or new device) → 5. Click Sign In.

faqs.q: I forgot my password – what should I do?
faqs.a: Click Forgot Password? on the login screen. A reset link will be sent to your personal email. Check spam/junk if you don’t see it.

faqs.q: Why can’t I log in with my company email?
faqs.a: Login uses your personal email only (the one you registered with). Company email is used for subscription & verification, but not for logging in.

faqs.q: Do I need CAPTCHA every time I log in?
faqs.a: No — only on first login, new device, or unusual activity. After that, you can enable 2FA for faster, secure access.

faqs.q: Can I log in from multiple devices?
faqs.a: Yes! Use your personal email + password on any device. Enable 2FA in settings for extra security on shared computers.

faqs.q: Why do I need a subscription before creating an account?
faqs.a: Subscription verifies your business and unlocks premium tools. It prevents spam and ensures you get full support from day one.
Yes! Fully responsive — manage customers, launch campaigns, and view reports on phone, tablet, or desktop.
We use bank-level AES-256 encryption, GDPR-compliant storage, and regular security audits. Your data is never shared.
Yes — cancel anytime in Account → Billing. Access continues until the end of your current billing cycle.

pointsPerDollar.desc: The base rate for earning points (e.g., 5 points for every $1 spent).

minAmount.label: Minimum Purchase Amount for Rewards ($)
minAmount.desc: The minimum spend required for any rewards (points or discounts) to be applied to a purchase.

purchase.title: 1. Purchase-Based Bonus Points
purchase.desc: Award **extra points** when a customer spends above a certain amount in a **single purchase**.

milestone.title: 2. Loyalty Milestone Rewards
milestone.desc: Award a **$ discount** when a customer's **total accumulated points** hits a milestone.

campaigns.desc: Set up a **limited-time** bonus to offer more points per dollar during a special event or promotion.
